variable.name: SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: Sample ID. Wave-tech-sample, namely growing wave number, technician surname initial, order in growing wave

variable.name: EXPRESSION_ARRAY_SERVICE
variable.description: Name of the service provider which ran the expression array
variable.value: University of Minnesota Genomics Center (formerly BMGC is abbreviation of Biomedical Genomics Center)

variable.name: EXPRESSION_ARRAY_BATCH
variable.description: Array batch (first or second) in which sample was run on expression array

variable.name: CELL_COUNT
variable.description: LCL cell count at harvest reflecting growth rate. Positive number with values from viable cell count at harvest x10 6 (24 hrs after 0.250 x 10^6 cells/ml) (see PMID: 23904455 for further details)

variable.name: ATP_PER_CELL_COUNT
variable.description: ATP level adjusted by number of cells reflecting energy status of LCLs. Positive number with values from ATP average of duplicate luminescence readings from ATP assay, corrected for concentration of cells by dividing by cell count (see PMID: 23904455 for further details)

variable.name: BACKGROUND_INTENSITY
variable.description: Background intensity of that sample - used to generate the normalized expression values from the raw (non-normalized) expression values. Positive number with values from expression assay. Positive number with values from expression assay

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected - all are LCLs made from peripheral blood [LCL]

variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Analyte type - all samples are RNA [RNA]
